resources.string: Microphone permission needs to access mic to record incoming or outgoing calls.
External Storage permission needs to store/play recorded audio file.
Phone State permission needs to intercept incoming and outgoing call to record audio.
Contacts permissions needs to access your contact book to show contact name instead of contact number.
Call Log permission required to identify caller at the time to recording the call.
Call Screening permission required to identify caller at the time to recording the call.
